text: Arau sihamtara nabiye sihamtaka kaichila, ‘niscaya allahe talutaka tomalokara babe raja hicape praerana karaiche’. Sihamte ka’le, ‘tara raajatba amara oparata kenekai sambhara? Athaca ami tatakai raajatbara bechi hakadara arau taka pracura aisbarya'o diya horaa na'i’! Te'om ka’le, ‘allahe niscaya taka tomalokara babe manonita karaiche arau te'om taka jnana arau sarairaikabharae samrd'dha karaiche; arau allahe yaka iccha nija raajatba pradana karae arau allaha sarbabyapi-praacuryamaya, sarbajna’
